input_text:
Job Title: Lead, Transportation - (BAIC)

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
$27.80-$43.08

Company Overview

The people of Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center (MSK) are united by a singular mission: ending cancer for life. Our specialized care teams provide personalized, compassionate, expert care to patients of all ages. Informed by basic research done at our Sloan Kettering Institute, scientists across MSK collaborate to conduct innovative translational and clinical research that is driving a revolution in our understanding of cancer as a disease and improving the ability to prevent, diagnose, and treat it. MSK is dedicated to training the next generation of scientists and clinicians, who go on to pursue our mission at MSK and around the globe.

 Please review important announcements about vaccination requirements and our upcoming EHR implementation by clicking here . 

 Important Note for MSK Employees: 

Your Career Hub profile is submitted to the hiring team as your internal resume. Please be sure your profile is fully complete with your skills, relevant experience and education (if required). Click here to learn more. Please note, this link is only accessible for MSK employees.

Job Description

At Memorial Sloan Kettering (MSK), we’re not only changing the way we treat cancer, but also the way the world thinks about it. By working together and pushing forward with innovation and discovery, we’re driving precision and improving outcomes.

We are looking to hire a team leader looking for a position within our transportation team!

 You Will: 

 Assists with the building of staff schedules to ensure adequate coverage for all department needs.  Maintains records of attendance and ensure staff are up-to-date on all required training, review time off requests and approvals and act as editor to MSK Time.  Maintains all spreadsheets in a neat, organized manner as appropriate including vehicle maintenance work orders Analyzes, organizes, and prioritizes calls and data for physicians, technicians, administrators, and manager to ensure availability for use in tracking, trouble shooting and problem solving.  Maintains all spreadsheets in a neat, organized manner as appropriate including vehicle maintenance work orders Run regular reports based on applicable data. Generate and send reports as requested.  Conduct department trainings as required. 

 You Need: 

 Experience working as a team leader Driver's License, Class D (Driver’s License is preferred) Proficiency in Microsof Excel and other applications Excellent written and verbal communication skills CDL Class C or higher w/Passenger Endorsement preferred. 

Work Schedule: Full-Time hours: Various shifts and open flexibility. M-F

Pay Range: $27.80-$43.08

Please click to learn more about MSK’s compensation philosophy.

 Closing 

MSK is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer committed to diversity and inclusion in all aspects of recruiting and employment. All qualified individuals are encouraged to apply and will receive consideration without regard to race, color, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, age, religion, creed, disability, veteran status or any other factor which cannot lawfully be used as a basis for an employment decision.

Federal law requires employers to provide reasonable accommodation to qualified individuals with disabilities. Please tell us if you require a reasonable accommodation to apply for a job or to perform your job. Examples of reasonable accommodation include making a change to the application process or work procedures, providing documents in an alternate format, using a sign language interpreter, or using specialized equipment.

Experience Level (if available): None

Maintains all spreadsheets in a neat, organized manner as appropriate including vehicle maintenance work orders
Analyzes, organizes, and prioritizes calls and data for physicians, technicians, administrators, and manager to ensure availability for use in tracking, trouble shooting and problem solving.
Maintains all spreadsheets in a neat, organized manner as appropriate including vehicle maintenance work orders
Run regular reports based on applicable data. Generate and send reports as requested.
